title: Hey Where is my reward?
body:
Hey Riot i hear all golds and higer division get moakai + skin ? 
I dont get anything i dont get summoner icon moakai ,skin + FRAME ? .
when i got it ? season is end and i want it get all im Gold 5 with out any reward :( ..

replies.body: His post history has him admitting to being punished, so rightfully he doesn't deserve rewards

> [{quoted}](name=ForFoxSakes,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Riqoo1Ek,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-22T16:59:43.118+0000)
>
> His post history has him admitting to being punished, so rightfully he doesn't deserve rewards

Ah, lol.

Nevermind then.
Really? .. i was get chat ban before season end about 4mounth , cmon its not real , i go play ranked and dont get reward in gold 5 ok ...

> [{quoted}](name=Pukjeens,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Riqoo1Ek,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-22T16:56:16.024+0000)
>
> Really? .. i was get chat ban before season end about 4mounth , cmon its not real , i go play ranked and dont get reward in gold 5 ok ...

Contact Support.
Were you banned or chat restricted? People that had disciplinary restrictions near the end of the season won't get rewards.
